verses.verse: And they brought <S%H935><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> and placed <S%H3322><s%> it inside <S%H8432><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> which <S%H834><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> had pitched <S%H5186><s%> for it, and they offered <S%H7126><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings <S%H5930><s%> and peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H8002><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

When David <S%H1732><s%> had finished <S%H3615><s%> offering <S%H5927><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and the peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, <S%H8002><s%> he blessed <S%H1288><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And he distributed <S%H2505><s%> to everyone <S%H3605><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> both <S%H4480><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and woman, <S%H802><s%> to everyone <S%H376><s%> a loaf <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> and a portion <S%H829><s%> [of meat] and a raisin <S%H809><s%> cake. <S%H809><s%>

And he appointed <S%H5414><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> [as] ministers <S%H8334><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> even to celebrate <S%H2142><s%> and to thank <S%H3034><s%> and praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

Asaph <S%H623><s%> the chief, <S%H7218><s%> and second <S%H4932><s%> to him Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> [then] Jeiel, <S%H3262><s%> Shemiramoth, <S%H8070><s%> Jehiel, <S%H3171><s%> Mattithiah, <S%H4993><s%> Eliab, <S%H446><s%> Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> Obed-edom, and Jeiel, <S%H3262><s%> with musical instruments, <S%H3627><s%> harps, <S%H5035><s%> lyres; <S%H3658><s%> also Asaph <S%H623><s%> [played] loud-sounding cymbals, <S%H4700><s%>

and Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> and Jahaziel <S%H3166><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> [blew] trumpets <S%H2689><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> first <S%H7218><s%> assigned <S%H5414><s%> Asaph <S%H623><s%> and his relatives <S%H251><s%> to give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Oh give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> upon His name; <S%H8034><s%> Make <S%H3045><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> His deeds <S%H5949><s%> among the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to Him, sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Him; Speak <S%H7878><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> His wonders. <S%H6381><s%>
Glory <S%H1984><s%> in His holy <S%H6944><s%> name; <S%H8034><s%> Let the heart <S%H3820><s%> of those who seek <S%H1245><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> be glad. <S%H8055><s%>
Seek <S%H1875><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and His strength; <S%H5797><s%> Seek <S%H1245><s%> His face <S%H6440><s%> continually. <S%H8548><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> His wonderful <S%H6381><s%> deeds <S%H6381><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He has done, <S%H6213><s%> His marvels <S%H4159><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> from His mouth, <S%H6310><s%>
O seed <S%H2233><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> His servant, <S%H5650><s%> Sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> His chosen <S%H972><s%> ones! <S%H972><s%>
He is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God; <S%H430><s%> His judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> His covenant <S%H1285><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> The word <S%H1697><s%> which He commanded <S%H6680><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations, <S%H1755><s%>
[The covenant] which <S%H834><s%> He made <S%H3772><s%> with Abraham, <S%H85><s%> And His oath <S%H7621><s%> to Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>
He also confirmed <S%H5975><s%> it to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a statute, <S%H2706><s%> To Israel <S%H3478><s%> as an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%>
Saying, <S%H559><s%> "To you I will give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> As the portion <S%H9112><s%> of your inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>"
When they were only a few <S%H4962><s%> in number, <S%H4557><s%> Very few, <S%H4592><s%> and strangers <S%H1481><s%> in it,
And they wandered <S%H1980><s%> about from nation <S%H1471><s%> to nation, <S%H1471><s%> And from [one] kingdom <S%H4467><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%>
He permitted <S%H5117><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> to oppress <S%H6231><s%> them, And He reproved <S%H3198><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> for their sakes, <S%H5921><s%> [saying,]
"Do not touch <S%H5060><s%> My anointed <S%H4899><s%> ones, <S%H4899><s%> And do <S%H7489><s%> My prophets <S%H5030><s%> no <S%H408><s%> harm. <S%H7489><s%>"

Sing <S%H7891><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> Proclaim <S%H1319><s%> good tidings <S%H1319><s%> of His salvation <S%H3444><s%> from day <S%H3117><s%> to day. <S%H3117><s%>
Tell <S%H5608><s%> of His glory <S%H9202><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> His wonderful <S%H6381><s%> deeds <S%H6381><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>

For great <S%H1419><s%> is the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised; <S%H1984><s%> He also is to be feared <S%H3372><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>
For all <S%H3605><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are idols, <S%H457><s%> But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
Splendor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1926><s%> are before <S%H6440><s%> Him, Strength <S%H5797><s%> and joy <S%H2304><s%> are in His place. <S%H4725><s%>
Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O families <S%H4940><s%> of the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H9202><s%> and strength. <S%H5797><s%>

Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> due His name; <S%H8034><s%> Bring <S%H5375><s%> an offering, <S%H4503><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him; Worship <S%H7812><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in holy <S%H6944><s%> array. <S%H1927><s%>

Tremble <S%H9123><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Him, all <S%H3605><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> Indeed, <S%H637><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> is firmly <S%H3559><s%> established, <S%H3559><s%> it will not be moved. <S%H4131><s%>

Let the heavens <S%H8064><s%> be glad, <S%H8055><s%> and let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice; <S%H1523><s%> And let them say <S%H559><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> reigns. <S%H4427><s%>"
Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar, <S%H7481><s%> and all <S%H4393><s%> it contains; <S%H4393><s%> Let the field <S%H7704><s%> exult, <S%H5970><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is in it.

Then <S%H227><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest <S%H9194><s%> will sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> For He is coming <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
O give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for [He is] good; <S%H2896><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>

Then say, <S%H559><s%> "Save <S%H3467><s%> us, O God <S%H430><s%> of our salvation, <S%H3468><s%> And gather <S%H6908><s%> us and deliver <S%H5337><s%> us from the nations, <S%H1471><s%> To give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thy holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> And glory <S%H9576><s%> in Thy praise. <S%H8416><s%>"

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> From everlasting <S%H5769><s%> even to everlasting. <S%H5769><s%> Then all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Amen, <S%H543><s%>" and praised <S%H1984><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

So he left <S%H5800><s%> Asaph <S%H623><s%> and his relatives <S%H251><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> as every day's work <S%H1697><s%> required; <S%H1697><s%>

and Obed-edom with his <S%H68><s%> <S%H8346><s%> <S%H8083><s%> relatives; <S%H251><s%> Obed-edom, also the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> and Hosah <S%H2621><s%> as gatekeepers. <S%H7778><s%>

And [he left] Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and his relatives <S%H251><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the high <S%H1116><s%> place <S%H1116><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [was] at Gibeon, <S%H1391><s%>

to offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings <S%H5930><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> and evening, <S%H6153><s%> even according to all <S%H3605><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He commanded <S%H6680><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And with them [were] Heman <S%H1968><s%> and Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> and the rest <S%H7605><s%> who were chosen, <S%H1305><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were designated <S%H9344><s%> by name, <S%H8034><s%> to give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>

And with them [were] Heman <S%H1968><s%> and Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> [with] trumpets <S%H2689><s%> and cymbals <S%H4700><s%> for those who should sound <S%H8085><s%> aloud, and [with] instruments <S%H3627><s%> [for] the songs <S%H7892><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> for the gate. <S%H8179><s%>

Then all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> departed <S%H1980><s%> each <S%H376><s%> to his house, <S%H1004><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> returned <S%H5437><s%> to bless <S%H1288><s%> his household. <S%H1004><s%>
